channel.title: CVE Feed for Codeless -- Cowidgets – Elementor Addons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Codeless -- Cowidgets – Elementor Addons

item.title: CVE-2024-35782|2024-06-05T05:15:37.945Z -- codeless -- cowidgets%20%E2%80%93%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Codeless Cowidgets – Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Cowidgets – Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.1.1.
